caption: Managed Entity
description: The Managed Entity object describes the type and version of an entity, such as a user, device, or policy. For types in the type_id enum list, an associated attribute should be populated. If the type of entity is not in the type_id list, information can be put into the data attribute and the type attribute should identify the entity.
name: managed_entity

data.description: The managed entity content as a JSON object.

group.description: Array of groups associated with the entity.

name.description: The name of the managed entity.

policies.description: Array of policies associated with the entity.

type_id.description: The type of the Managed Entity.

uid.description: The identifier of the managed entity.

user.description: Array of users associated with the entity.

version.description: The version of the managed entity.
